primary.usage: Primary buttons, heavy text, structural borders

accent.usage: Call to actions (CTAs), critical alerts, highlights

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300 font-manrope font-semibold tracking-wide px-8 py-3 rounded-md
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 hover:border-slate-300 transition-all duration-200 font-manrope font-medium px-6 py-3 rounded-md

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle grid patterns (bg-[url('/grid.svg')]) on section backgrounds to reinforce the 'blueprint' theme.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React icons. Use thin strokes (stroke-width={1.5}) for a technical feel.
visual_enhancers.decorations: Use 1px lines (border-slate-200) to separate sections. Avoid heavy drop shadows; prefer borders and layout structure.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA (4.5:1). Use Slate-900 for text on white.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings on all interactive elements.

hero_bg.alt: Professional analyzing blueprints with magnifying glass
hero_bg.usage: Hero section background with heavy dark overlay

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. FONTS: Add Manrope and Playfair Display to index.css via Google Fonts import.
3. TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to include the custom colors (slate-900 as primary, orange-500 as accent).
4. LAYOUT: Build the Landing Page using the 'Tetris Grid' strategy. Do not stack everything in a single column.
5. WIZARD: Create a 'WizardLayout' component that handles the progress bar and step transitions centrally.
6. RESULTS: The Results page must be dramatic. Use a large radial gauge or big typography for the score.
7. FORMS: Use Shadcn Form components but style them with the 'inputs.base' styles defined above.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid attributes to all buttons, inputs, and result cards (e.g., 'start-assessment-btn', 'risk-score-display').
universal_guidelines: Avoid gradients for backgrounds; use solid colors or subtle patterns.
Do not use 'Inter' for headings; use 'Manrope'.
Ensure the 'Jeppsonlaw, LLP' brand name always uses 'Playfair Display'.
Keep the UI 'clean' - ample whitespace is part of the 'Clean Bill of Health' metaphor.
